node.name: Trackmylyn
node.shortdescription:
Trackmylyn is a connector for Eclipse Mylyn and permits you to work with the Track+ issue tracker and project management software directly from within Eclipse. You can create, view, and edit tasks, and attach Eclipse contexts as attachments to Track+ tasks.

Trackmylyn permits you to use and define query filters, and you will have the same mask layout (issue attributes and positions on the screen) as in the web interface.
node.body:
Trackmylyn is a connector for Eclipse Mylyn and permits you to work with the Track+ issue tracker and project management software directly from within Eclipse. You can create, view, and edit tasks, and attach Eclipse contexts as attachments to Track+ tasks.

Trackmylyn permits you to use and define query filters, and you will have the same mask layout (issue attributes and positions on the screen) as in the web interface.
